channel.title: Game Design on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Game Design on My New Hugo Site

item.title: RushRushVR
item.description: For the final project of my VR Game Development course, I teamed up with several developers to create a small VR microgame collection. I was fully responsible for the programming and design of two microgames, as well as the overall design philosophy and game loop.
